page.title: 08Tourism (2), Bowness.
page.content: There are numerous{hotels}and{guest {houses in}the area,together with {restaurants,cafes,snack bars}and{gift {shops. Thousands of{tourists}are attracted each year to the area because of its natural beauty.When the{weather}is not too good they all seem to crowd into the small area between{Crag Brow}and the{Promenade}causing numerous traffic and pedestrian jams. A{ferry}crosses{Windermere}from{Ferry {Nab}to{Ferry House}on the western shore. The ferry is called{Drake}and can carry{10 cars}at a time. It takes under{10 mins}to cross the lake,but in summer the{queues}can be waiting for up to{2 hrs!
